Docs.summary: Gets and sets a description of the current instance.
Gets and sets the timestamp format used by the current instance.
Docs.value: A describing the timestamp format used in the current instance.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the ISO-639-2 language code of the current instance.
Docs.value: A containing an ISO-639-2 language code for the current instance.
Docs.remarks: If the language is unknown, "XXX" is the appropriate filler.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the text for the current instance.
Docs.remarks: Elements in the array should be stored in order of occurance.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the text encoding to use when rendering the current instance.
Docs.value: A specifying the text encoding to use when rendering.
Docs.remarks: This value is overridden if is or if the save version does not support it.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the type of text contained in the current instance.
Docs.value: A specifying the type of text represented.

Docs.param: A containing an ID3v2 frame.
A specifying the ID3v2 version the frame is stored in.
Docs.summary: Constructs and intializes a new instance of from a raw ID3v2 frame.

Docs.param: A containing an ID3v2 frame.
A specifying at what index in the frame begins.
A containing header information for the new instance.
A specifying the ID3v2 version the frame is stored in.

A containing the ISO-639-2 language of the new instance.
A specifying the type of text contained in the new instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public SynchronisedLyricsFrame (string description, string language, TagLib.Id3v2.SynchedTextType type, TagLib.StringType encoding);

Docs.param: A containing a description of the new instance.
A containing the ISO-639-2 language of the new instance.
A specifying the type of text contained in the new instance.
A specifying what text encoding to use when saving the new instance.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initialized a new instance of with a specified description, language, text type, and text encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Id3v2.SynchronisedLyricsFrame Get (TagLib.Id3v2.Tag tag, string description, string language, TagLib.Id3v2.SynchedTextType type, bool create);

Docs.param: A to search.
A specifying a description to search for.
A specifying a language to search for.
A specifying the type of text to search for.
A specifying whether or not to create a new instance if one is not found.
Docs.summary: Searches for a with a specified description, language, and type, optionally creating one if none is found.
Docs.returns: A containing with the given description, language, and type, or if not found and not creating.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TagLib.Id3v2.SynchronisedLyricsFrame GetPreferred (TagLib.Id3v2.Tag tag, string description, string language, TagLib.Id3v2.SynchedTextType type);

Docs.param: A to search.
A specifying a description to search for.
A specifying a language to search for.
A specifying the type of text to search for.
Docs.summary: Searches for the which most closely matches the specified description, language, and type.
Docs.returns: The which most closely matches the specified description, language, and type, or if none was found.
Docs.remarks: If an exact match is found, it will be returned. After that, the first frame with a matching language. Then, the first frame with a matching description. The, the first frame with a matching text type, Finally, the first frame found.

Docs.summary: This class is used for accessing and modifying ID3v2 Synchronized Lyrics/Text (SYLT) frames.
